mapper.select: SELECT li.lec_id as lec_id ,lei.lec_name as lec_name ,hmk.hwk_id as hwk_id ,hmk.hwk_name as hwk_name ,li.std_id as std_id FROM tb_lecstd_info li INNER JOIN tb_lec_info lei on lei.lec_id = li.lec_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_hmk hmk on hmk.lec_id = li.lec_id where li.std_id=#{loginID} and li.apv_yn = 'y' and exists( select 1 from tb_hmk bk where bk.lec_id = li.lec_id )
